trans-unit.source: Represents a grammar element that contains phrases or other entities that a user can speak to produce a successful recognition.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento de gramática que contém frases ou outras entidades que um usuário pode falar para produzir um reconhecimento bem-sucedido.

trans-unit.source: An SrgsItem object can consist of phrases, entities such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects, logical combinations of phrases and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto SrgsItem pode consistir de frases, entidades, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>objetos, as combinações de lógicas de frases e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>objetos e assim por diante.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> property on the SrgsItem class to gain access to the constituents of an SrgsItem object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>propriedade na classe SrgsItem para acessar os constituintes de um objeto SrgsItem.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>

trans-unit.source: The order in which SrgsItem objects appear in a given <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object specifies the order in which a user must speak them.
trans-unit.target: A ordem na qual SrgsItem objetos aparecem em um determinado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto Especifica a ordem na qual um usuário deve falá-los.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: By default, the contents of an SrgsItem must be spoken exactly once.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o conteúdo de um SrgsItem deve ser falado exatamente uma vez.

trans-unit.source: To specify that the contents of an SrgsItem must be spoken repeatedly, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor and set the `repeatCount` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar que o conteúdo de um SrgsItem deve ser falado repetidamente, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.%23ctor%2A>construtor e defina o `repeatCount` parâmetro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, to specify a range for the number of times that an SrgsItem can be spoken, create the SrgsItem with one of the constructors that set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> property and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, para especificar um intervalo para o número de vezes que um SrgsItem pode ser dita, crie o SrgsItem com um dos construtores que definam o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SrgsItem already exists, you can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> methods to specify repeats.
trans-unit.target: Se o SrgsItem já existir, você pode usar uma da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>métodos para especificar as repetições.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the probability that an item will be repeatedly spoken by setting the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar a probabilidade de que um item será falado repetidamente, definindo o valor da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A>

trans-unit.source: SrgsItem objects within an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object comprise a list of alternatives from which the user can speak one.
trans-unit.target: SrgsItem objetos dentro de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>objeto compõem uma lista de alternativas a partir do qual o usuário pode falar um.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A> property to specify the likelihood that a given item in the list will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A>propriedade para especificar a probabilidade de que um determinado item na lista será falado.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SrgsItem class represents the `item` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: SrgsItem classe representa o `item` elemento que é definido no World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `item` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [item Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o SRGS `item` elemento e detalhes sobre o suporte por Speech, consulte [item elemento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies the number of times that its contents must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> classe e especifica o número de vezes que o conteúdo deve ser falado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> properties of the new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> to the value in `repeatCount`.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>Propriedades do novo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>com o valor em `repeatCount`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the item must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O número de vezes que o item deve ser falado.

trans-unit.source: repeatCount is negative or is larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: repeatCounté negativo ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects to add to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> classe e especifica uma matriz de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> objetos para adicionar a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The array of objects to add to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de objetos para adicionar ao <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: elements is .
trans-unit.target: elementsis .

trans-unit.source: Any member of the elements array is .
trans-unit.target: Qualquer membro do elements matriz é .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies its textual contents.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> classe e especifica seu conteúdo textual.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the item.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado ao item.

trans-unit.source: text is .
trans-unit.target: textis .

trans-unit.source: text is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: texté uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies minimum and maximum repetition counts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> classe e especifica a contagem de repetição de mínimo e máximo.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the text in the item must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de vezes que o texto no item deve ser repetido.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the text in the item can be repeated.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de vezes que o texto no item pode ser repetido.

trans-unit.source: min is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: miné negativo ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: max is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: maxé negativo ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: min is larger than max.
trans-unit.target: miné maior do que max.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class, specifies an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects to add to this instance, and sets minimum and maximum repetition counts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> classe, especifica uma matriz de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> objetos para adicionar a esta instância e define a contagem de repetição de mínimo e máximo.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> object must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de vezes que o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> objeto deve ser repetido.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> object can be repeated.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de vezes que o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> objeto pode ser repetido.

trans-unit.source: The array of objects to add to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de objetos para adicionar ao <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: elements is .
trans-unit.target: elementsis .

trans-unit.source: Any member of the elements array is .
trans-unit.target: Qualquer membro do elements matriz é .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class, specifies the text associated with the item, and specifies minimum and maximum repetition counts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> classe, especifica o texto associado ao item e especifica a contagem de repetição de mínimo e máximo.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the item must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de vezes que o item deve ser repetido.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the item can be repeated.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de vezes que o item pode ser repetido.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the item.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado ao item.

trans-unit.source: min is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: miné negativo ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: max is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: maxé negativo ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: min is larger than max.
trans-unit.target: miné maior do que max.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the collection of objects contained in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto à coleção de objetos contidos neste <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The Add method appends an element to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método Add acrescenta um elemento para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to add.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: element is.
trans-unit.target: elementis.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of objects contained by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos contidos pelo <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The collection of objects contained by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de objetos contidos pelo <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of times that a user can speak the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número máximo de vezes que um usuário pode falar o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To set this property, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para definir essa propriedade, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents a portion of the `repeat` attribute defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma parte do `repeat` atributo definido pelo World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that a user can speak the contents of the item.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de vezes que um usuário pode falar o conteúdo do item.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum number of times that a user must speak the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número mínimo de vezes que um usuário deve falar o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To set this property, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para definir essa propriedade, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents a portion of the `repeat` attribute of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS).
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma parte do `repeat` atributo do World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) fala reconhecimento gramática especificação (SRGS).

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that a user can speak the contents of the item.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de vezes que um usuário pode falar o conteúdo do item.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the probability that a user will repeat the contents of this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a probabilidade de que um usuário se repetirá o conteúdo desse <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The property applies only to items whose <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> properties have been explicitly set to non-default values, either by a constructor for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>or by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade se aplica somente aos itens cujo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>propriedades foram definidas explicitamente como valores não padrão, por um construtor para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>ou o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The probability, as a floating point value, that the contents of this item will be repeatedly spoken.
trans-unit.target: A probabilidade, como um flutuante ponto de valor, que o conteúdo deste item será falado repetidamente.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set RepeatProbability to a value that is negative or larger than 1.0.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa para definir RepeatProbability para um valor negativo ou maior que 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of times that the contents of an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Define o número de vezes que o conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> devem ser falados.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> properties to the value in `count`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>Propriedades para o valor em `count`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the item must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O número de vezes que o item deve ser falado.

trans-unit.source: count is less than 0 or greater than 255.
trans-unit.target: counté menor que 0 ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum number of times and the maximum number of times that an item can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Define o número mínimo de vezes e o número máximo de vezes que um item pode ser dita.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the item must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de vezes que o item deve ser falado.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the item can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de vezes que o item pode ser dita.

trans-unit.source: minRepeat is less than zero or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: minRepeaté menor que zero ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: maxRepeat is less than zero or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: maxRepeaté menor que zero ou maior que 255.

trans-unit.source: minRepeat is larger than maxRepeat.
trans-unit.target: minRepeaté maior do que maxRepeat.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a multiplying factor that adjusts the likelihood that an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> object will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um fator de multiplicação que ajusta a probabilidade de que uma <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> em uma <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"> </xref> objeto será falado.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is 1.0, which is equivalent to no weighting of the item.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão dessa propriedade é 1.0, que é equivalente sem importância do item.

trans-unit.source: A weight greater than 1.0 positively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken, and a weight less than 1.0 negatively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Um peso maior 1.0 biases positivamente a probabilidade de que o item será falado e um peso menor que 1.0 biases negativamente a probabilidade de que o item será falado.

trans-unit.source: This property is relevant only to <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects within an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> instance; it is ignored in all other cases.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é relevante apenas para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>objetos dentro de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>instância; é ignorado em todos os outros casos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: A floating point value that adjusts the likelihood of this item being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto flutuante valor que ajusta a probabilidade deste item que está sendo falado.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Weight to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa para definir o peso para um valor negativo.
